alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw; Fayette (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 7:14PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Fayette and Chickasaw Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 714 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Nashua to near Jesup. Movement was north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Nashua around 725 PM CDT. Ionia around 740 PM CDT. New Hampton around 750 PM CDT. Maynard around 800 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
